name: Fire Extinguisher OP‑2 (z) ABCЕ RIF
description: The OP‑2 (z) ABCЕ dry powder fire extinguisher by RIF is a compact device for quickly extinguishing fires of classes A (solids), B (liquids), C (gases), and E (electrical equipment up to 1000 V). It contains about 2 kg of powder and has a cylinder volume of approximately 2.3 liters. Operating pressure is up to 1.6 MPa, and discharge range is up to 2 meters. Suitable for use in vehicles, offices, retail, and residential premises. Operates in a temperature range from –40 °C to +50 °C. Recharge is recommended every 5 years.
short_description: Compact 2 kg extinguisher — ideal for cars and homes.

name: Fire Extinguisher OP‑3 (z) ABCЕ RIF
description: The OP‑3 (z) ABCЕ fire extinguisher is a universal firefighting tool with about 3 kg of powder. It is suitable for extinguishing flammable solids, liquids, gases, and electrical equipment under voltage. Provides effective protection for areas up to 30 m². Equipped with a shut-off and start mechanism, it operates in temperatures from –40 °C to +50 °C. Commonly used in offices, stores, and warehouses. Discharge range up to 2 m, duration about 8 seconds.
short_description: Reliable 3 kg extinguisher for home and business.

name: Fire Extinguisher OP-4 (z) ABCE RIF
description: The OP-4 (z) ABCE from RIF is a stored-pressure powder fire extinguisher designed to combat fires of classes A, B, C, and E. It contains ~4 kg of powder and has a body volume of about 4 liters, capable of effectively extinguishing flames over an area up to 40 m². It offers a great balance between compactness and power. Discharge range — up to 3 meters, discharge time — about 10 seconds. Suitable for offices, homes, workshops, and small production areas. Operating temperature range: –40 to +50 °C.
short_description: Versatile 4 kg fire extinguisher — a balanced choice.

name: Fire Extinguisher OP-5 (z) ABCE RIF
description: The OP-5 (z) powder fire extinguisher from RIF is designed to suppress fires of classes A, B, C, and E. It contains about 5 kg of powder and has enhanced fire suppression capabilities. Suitable for use in residential, commercial, and warehouse facilities. Discharge range — up to 3 m, discharge duration — up to 10 s. Operating temperature: –40 to +50 °C. Highly reliable, with a service life of up to 10 years if maintained properly.
short_description: Efficient 5 kg extinguisher — for office, warehouse, and home.

name: Fire Extinguisher OP-6 (z) ABCE RIF
description: The OP-6 (z) ABCE stored-pressure powder fire extinguisher by RIF (Tula) contains around 6 kg of universal powder. Designed to extinguish class A, B, C, and E fires (up to 1000 V). Effectively protects areas up to 60 m². Discharge range is ~3 m, with a discharge time of at least 12 s. Working pressure — up to 1.4 MPa. Total weight — about 7.5–7.8 kg. Operating temperature range — from –40 to +50 °C. Service life of at least 10 years with a recommended recharge every 5 years.
short_description: OP-6: 6 kg powder charge, protects up to 60 m²

name: Fire Extinguisher OP-8 (z) ABCE RIF
description: The OP-8 (z) ABCE stored-pressure powder fire extinguisher from RIF contains about 8 kg of universal powder for extinguishing class A, B, C, and E fires (up to 1000 V). Recommended for spaces up to 80 m². Discharge range reaches up to 4 m, discharge time — at least 15 s. Total weight — approximately 10.7 kg. Maximum pressure ~1.4 MPa. Operating temperature range — from –40 to +50 °C. Service life up to 10 years with mandatory recharging every 5 years.
short_description: Powerful OP-8: 8 kg powder, protects up to 80 m²

name: Fire Extinguisher OP-10 (z) ABCE RIF
description: The OP-10 (z) ABCE stored-pressure powder fire extinguisher by RIF — a large unit with ~10 kg of powder for extinguishing fires of classes A, B, C, and E. Covers areas up to 100 m². Discharge range — up to 4 m, discharge duration — at least 15 s. Total weight — up to 14 kg, working pressure ~1.4 MPa. Operating temperature: –40…+50 °C. Service life — up to 10 years, with recharge every 5 years.
short_description: OP-10: 10 kg powder, extinguishes up to 100 m²

name: Fire Extinguisher OP-25 (z) ABCE
description: The OP-25 (z) ABCE powder fire extinguisher by OGNEBORETS contains ~25 kg of powder and is designed to suppress fires of classes A, B, C, and E at industrial sites and warehouses. Provides fire protection over an area of approximately 250 m². Equipped with a shut-off trigger mechanism, suited for prolonged discharge. Ideal for professional use. Operating temperature — from –40 to +50 °C. Service life — up to 10 years, with recharge at least once every 5 years.
short_description: OP-25: 25 kg of powder — industrial fire protection

name: Fire Extinguisher OP-35 (z) ABCE OGNEBORETS
description: The OP-35 (z) ABCE heavy-duty stored-pressure powder fire extinguisher by OGNEBORETS contains ~35 kg of powder in a ~43.8 l steel tank. Designed for extinguishing fires of classes A, B, C, and E (up to 1000 V). Certified for model fire rating 6A and 233B. Discharge range over 6 m, discharge time — at least 20 seconds. Working pressure — ~1.8 MPa. Total weight — up to 52 kg. Operating temperature: –50 to +50 °C. Service life — not less than 10 years.
short_description: Powerful 35 kg extinguisher — for industrial use and warehouses.

name: Fire Extinguisher OP-40 (z) ABCE OGNEBORETS
description: The OP-40 (z) ABCE wheeled powder fire extinguisher is a powerful model with ~40 kg of powder and a ~50 l tank. Suitable for extinguishing class A, B, C, and E fires (up to 1000 V). Fire rating — 6A and 233B. Discharge range up to 6 m, discharge time — about 20 seconds. Total weight — up to 60–67 kg. Steel body, pressure ~1.6–1.8 MPa. Operating temperature range: –50 to +50 °C. Service life — at least 10 years.
short_description: OP-40: 40 kg of powder, up to 400 m² protection area (depending on conditions).

name: Fire Extinguisher OP‑50 (z) ABCE OGNEBORETS
description: Powder-type stored pressure fire extinguisher OP‑50 (z) ABCE by OGNEBORETS. Charge: ~50 kg of powder, body volume ~60 L. Effective for extinguishing class A, B, C, and E fires (up to 1000 V). Fire rating: 6A and 233B. Discharge duration ≈20 s, stream range ≥6 m. Total weight — up to 72 kg. Operating temperature range: –50…+50 °C. Service life — approx. 10 years.
short_description: High-capacity model: 50 kg powder, designed for large fire outbreaks.

name: Fire Extinguisher OP‑70 (z) ABCE OGNEBORETS
description: OP‑70 (z) ABCE — powerful powder extinguisher by OGNEBORETS with ~70 kg charge and body volume from ~69 to 88 L. Designed for class A, B, C, and E fires (up to 1000 V). Fire rating: 10A and 233B‑2. Discharge duration — about 20–30 s depending on the model, stream length ≥6 m. Total weight — up to 95–99 kg. Working pressure — ~1.8 MPa. Temperature range: –50…+50 °C. Service life — not less than 10 years.
short_description: 70 kg model: fire rating up to 10A, 233B‑2 for large-scale areas.

name: Fire Extinguisher OP‑100 (z) ABCE OGNEBORETS
description: Professional wheeled powder extinguisher OP‑100 (z) ABCE by OGNEBORETS. Charge: ~100 kg powder, body ~120 L. Suitable for class A, B, C, and E fires (up to 1000 V), rating 10A and 233B‑2. Stream up to 6 m, discharge time ≈20 s, up to 30 s. Total weight — 125–143 kg. Operating temperature: –40…+50 °C. Service life — approx. 10 years.
short_description: Maximum capacity: 100 kg powder, professional protection for large sites.

name: Carbon Dioxide Fire Extinguisher OU‑2 (BCE) RIF
description: CO₂ fire extinguisher OU‑2 (z) BCE by RIF with ~2 kg CO₂ charge. For extinguishing class B, C, E fires (up to 10 000 V). Leaves no residue. Stream length up to 2 m, discharge time ~6 s. Total weight ~7 kg. Working pressure ~5.88 MPa. Operating range –40…+50 °C. Protected area — up to 20 m². Recharge every 5–10 years.
short_description: 2 kg CO₂ bottle — for server rooms, switchboards, offices.

name: Carbon Dioxide Fire Extinguisher OU‑3 (BCE) RIF
description: OU‑3 CO₂ fire extinguisher (z) BCE by RIF with ~3 kg CO₂ charge. Fire rating: 34B, C, E (up to 10 000 V). Effective for liquid and electrical fires without residue. Total weight — ~11.5 kg, stream length ~3 m, discharge ~6–8 s. Operating range –40…+50 °C.
short_description: OU‑3: 3 kg CO₂ — clean extinguishing, ideal for offices and servers.

name: Carbon Dioxide Fire Extinguisher OU‑5 (BCE) RIF
description: Portable CO₂ fire extinguisher OU‑5 (z) BCE by RIF with ~5 kg CO₂ charge. Effective for class B (liquids), C (gases), and E (electrical up to ~10 000 V). Leaves no trace, suitable for server rooms, offices, switchboards. Stream length ~3 m, discharge ~8 s. Total weight ~16 kg, pressure ~5.88 MPa. Operating range: –40…+50 °C. Fire rating — up to 55B. Service life — up to 10 years, recharge max every 5 years.
short_description: OU‑5: 5 kg CO₂ — ideal for servers, offices, and switchboards.

name: Carbon Dioxide Fire Extinguisher OU‑7 (BCE) RIF
description: CO₂ fire extinguisher OU‑7 (z) BCE by RIF — powerful model with ~7 kg CO₂. Designed for class B, C, and E fires. Ideal for servers, warehouses, switchboards. Long gas release, stream ~3–4 m, time — up to 10 s. Working pressure — ~5.88 MPa. Temp. range –40…+50 °C. Service life — up to 10 years, recharge every 5 years.
short_description: OU‑7: 7 kg CO₂ — for large offices and storage rooms.

name: Carbon Dioxide Fire Extinguisher OU‑10 (BCE) RIF
description: CO₂ fire extinguisher OU‑10 (z) BCE by RIF with ~10 kg CO₂ charge. Designed for class B, C, E fires in large spaces like industrial or technical rooms. Stream up to 4 m, discharge ~10 s. Pressure ~5.88 MPa. Weight ~32 kg. Temp. range –40…+50 °C. Service life — up to 10 years, recharge every 5 years.
short_description: OU‑10: 10 kg CO₂ — industrial model for demanding tasks.

name: Carbon Dioxide Fire Extinguisher OU‑25 (BCE) RIF
description: CO₂ fire extinguisher OU‑25 (z) BCE by RIF with total ~25 kg CO₂ (2×12.5 kg). For class B, C, E fires in industrial areas and large warehouses. High extinguishing power, stream ~4 m, discharge ~15 s. Weight ~60 kg, pressure ~5.88 MPa. Operating range –40…+50 °C. Service life — up to 10 years, recharge every 5 years.
short_description: OU‑25: 25 kg CO₂ (2×12.5 kg) — professional grade.

name: Powder Fire Extinguishing Module MPP‑2.5
description: Automatic powder fire extinguishing module MPP‑2.5 (type Yarpoghinvest / MIG) with approximately 2.3 kg of ABC powder. Activates when the temperature reaches about 68 °C — the thermal block destroys the casing, and the powder is dispersed. Protected area — up to ~7 m², volume — ~18 m³. Pressure — ~1.5 MPa, discharge time — from 1 to 15 s, mass inertness ~60 s. Operating temperature range –50…+50 °C. Module weight — up to ~3.8 kg. Service life — up to 10 years.
short_description: Automatic MPP‑2.5 module: discharge at +68 °C, coverage ~7 m².

name: Powder Fire Extinguishing Module MMP-3
description: Self-activating module MMP-3 (type MIG / Yarpoghinvest) with a ~2.6–3 kg ABC powder charge, triggers at ~68 °C. Designed for extinguishing class A, B, C, and E fires automatically without human intervention. Effective for rooms up to ~30–40 m³, extinguishing area ~10–14 m². Activation pressure — ~1.5 MPa, discharge time — 1 s (intense dispersion), inertia ~60 s. Operating temperature — ≈–50…+50 °C. Full weight — ~4.8–5 kg. Service life — up to 10 years.
short_description: MMP‑3: self-activating module with ~3 kg powder for automatic fire protection.

name: Powder Fire Extinguishing Module MMP-5
description: Self-activating MMP-5 module (Yarpoghinvest) with a ~4.5 kg charge of ‘Triumph-70m’ or ‘Vekson-ABC 50’ powder. Activates at ~68 °C, minimal contamination, suitable for extinguishing A, B, C, and E fires. Protected area at ~2–3 m height — up to ~10 m². Body volume ~5 L, full weight ~8.1 kg. Pressure ~1.4–1.5 MPa. Operating temperature — –50…+50 °C. Service life up to 10 years.
short_description: Reliable MMP‑5 (~4.5 kg powder), automatic protection for small facilities.

name: Powder Fire Extinguishing Module MMP-7
description: Autonomous MMP-7 module with ~7 kg ABC powder. Activates at ~68 °C, suitable for A, B, C, and E fires. Effective for medium-sized rooms (~40–60 m³), protected area up to ~20–30 m². Activation pressure ~1.5 MPa. Discharge time — up to 15 s, inertia — ~60 s. Operating temperature — –50…+50 °C, full weight ~10–11 kg, service life — up to 10 years.
short_description: MMP‑7: automatic powder module with ~7 kg charge, ideal for mid-size areas.

name: Powder Fire Extinguishing Module MMP-12
description: Self-activating MMP-12 module (Yarpoghinvest / MIG type), with thermal lock at +68 °C and ~10.5 kg ABC powder. Designed for automatic suppression of class A, B, C, and E fires. Effective for volumes up to ~100 m³ and areas up to ~45 m². Discharge duration up to 15 s, inertia ~60 s. Working pressure ~1.5 MPa, full weight ~17 kg. Operating temperature –50 °C to +50 °C. Service life — up to 10 years; recharge required every 10 years.
short_description: MMP‑12: automatic powder module ~10.5 kg, covers up to 45 m² / 100 m³.

name: Refill Service for OP‑2 Extinguisher
description: Refilling service for OP‑2 (z) ABC extinguisher — professional restoration of functionality after use or expiration. Includes powder replacement, pressure and seal check, actuator testing in accordance with GOST.
short_description: OP‑2 refilled in one day — ready for action again.

name: Refill Service for OP‑3 Extinguisher
description: Certified refill service for OP‑3 (z) ABC extinguisher. Includes pressure check, leak inspection, charge weight verification, and actuator safety/functionality check — all per standards.
short_description: OP‑3 refilled — fast and professional.

name: Refill Service for OP‑4 Extinguisher
description: Full-service refill for OP‑4 (z) ABC extinguisher: old powder disposal, case inspection, optional actuator replacement, certified powder fill, pressure/seal check. Complies with GOST and SP norms. Post-service: sealed and labeled.
short_description: OP‑4 back in action — refill in 1 day with warranty.

name: Refill Service for OP‑5 Extinguisher
description: Complete OP‑5 extinguisher refill includes disassembly, seal check, powder replacement, internal cleaning, optional actuator replacement. Fully compliant with GOST R 51057‑2001 and fire safety norms. Service certificate provided. Recommended every 5 years or after use.
short_description: OP‑5 refill — certified service without delays.

name: Brass Fire Valve Russia DN 50 (≈51 mm)
description: Brass fire valve DN 50 (≈51 mm), marking 15BZR, for indoor fire water systems. Suitable for water up to +50 °C, working pressure ~1.6 MPa. Weight 1.8–2.2 kg. Available in straight or angled (90°/125°) versions. Valve meets NPB 154‑2000.
short_description: Brass valve DN 50/51 mm, made in Russia, up to 16 bar.

name: Brass Fire Valve Russia DN 65
description: Brass fire valve DN 65 (65 mm), Russia-made, angled (125° or 90°). Made of brass LTs40SD or equivalent. Operating pressure up to 1.6 MPa, temperature up to +50 °C. Weight ~2.0–2.3 kg. Installed in fire cabinets and internal piping systems.
short_description: Angled brass fire valve DN 65, Russia, up to 16 bar.

name: Valve-Cock China DN 50 Angled 125°

short_description: D77 hose, 16 bar, 20 m, PREMIUM, with GR-70, Russia.

name: Lafette Nozzle SLK-P20
description: Portable combined lafette nozzle SLK-P20 (GOST 9029‑95 / DSTU 2802‑94). Produces both water stream and air-mechanical foam.
short_description: Lafette nozzle SLK-P20, water/foam, range up to 55 m.

name: Underground Hydrant GP-0.75
description: Underground fire hydrant GP-0.75 m made of ductile cast iron. Height — 750 mm, inner body diameter — 125 mm. Operating pressure — up to 1 MPa (10 bar). Weight — up to 52 kg. Climatic resistance — down to –60 °C.
short_description: Hydrant GP-0.75 m, underground, cast iron, 10 bar, ≈52 kg.

name: Fire Standpipe KP
description: Fire standpipe KPA (GOST 7499‑95 / DSTU 2801‑94) is used to open underground hydrants and connect hoses. Equipped with a valve and DN 77 hose connections.
short_description: Standpipe KPA for hydrant, connects DN 77 hoses.

name: Three-Way Hose Divider RT-70
description: Three-way hose divider RT-70 (GOST 8037‑93 / DSTU 2111‑92), DN 70 inlet, one central DN 70 outlet and two side DN 50 outlets. Pressure — up to 1.2 MPa. Weight — approx. 5.3–5.6 kg.
short_description: Divider RT-70, inlet 70 mm, outlets 2×50, 1.2 MPa.

name: Three-Way Hose Divider RT-80
description: Three-way hose divider RT-80 (inlet DN 80, two side 50 mm outlets). Working pressure — up to 1.2 MPa. Weight — ~6.3 kg, dimensions — 375×465×280 mm. Hydraulic resistance ≈1.5.
short_description: RT-80: inlet 80 mm, 2×50 mm outlets, 1.2 MPa, ~6.3 kg.

name: Foam Generator GPS-600 (Medium Expansion)
description: Foam generator GPS-600 — portable air-mechanical unit of medium expansion (≈100±30), used for producing foam and extinguishing liquid fires. Delivers up to 600 L/s foam with solution consumption of 4.8–6.0 L/s at 0.4–0.6 MPa. Covers up to 120 m² (flammable liquids) or 75 m² (highly flammable). Weight ≈4.5 kg, connection head DN 65–70. Service life — at least 8 years.
short_description: GPS‑600: 600 L/s foam, expansion ≈100, covers up to 120 m².

name: Linear Smoke Detector IPDL-IID(4R)
description: Optoelectronic linear smoke detector IPDL-IID(4R) (by Poliservice) — two-part (receiver + emitter) with contamination compensation. Detects smoke via IR beam attenuation up to 150 m. Coverage area — up to 1350 m². Adjustable sensitivity, microprocessor logic, fault/fire alerts. Ready in ≤30 s, response in ≤5 s.
short_description: IPDL-IID(4R): linear smoke detector, 150 m, 1350 m².

name: Surface-Mount Exit Button with LED
description: Metal surface-mount exit button with LED indication — provides visual feedback upon activation. Used in fire alarm and access control systems. Compact, vandal-resistant, with light indicator.
short_description: Surface-mount exit button with LED, metal.

name: Surface-Mount Exit Button (No LED)
description: Metal surface-mount exit button without backlight. Compact and reliable, used in emergency exit and access control systems.
short_description: Surface-mount exit button, metal, no backlight.

name: Flush-Mount Exit Button
description: Metal flush-mount exit button for concealed installation. Minimalist design, embedded into walls or doorframes, meets safety standards.
short_description: Flush-mount exit button, metal, concealed installation.

name: Surface-Mounted Touch Button (Without LED)
description: Surface-mounted touch exit button — contactless solution for unlocking doors. Suitable for access control and evacuation systems. Metal housing, sensitive touch area, no LED indication.
short_description: Surface-mounted touch exit button without LED.

name: Flush-Mounted Touch Exit Button
description: Metallic touch exit button for concealed installation (flush-mounted). Designed for contactless activation of an exit signal or unlocking a lock in case of fire. Operates via capacitive touch technology.
short_description: Flush-mounted touch exit button — metal, contactless activation.

name: Emergency Button with Safety Key
description: Surface-mounted emergency button with key lock — prevents false activation. Turning the key triggers the alarm signal in fire and security systems. Metal housing with hermetic protection.
short_description: Emergency button with key — reliable protection against false triggers.

name: Heat Detector IP‑103‑5
description: IP‑103‑5 fixed-temperature heat detector (Russia). Activation temperature 64–76 °C, normally closed contacts. Provides reliable alarm upon temperature rise without smoke or gas. Operates from −40 to +60 °C.
short_description: IP‑103‑5: fixed-temperature fire detector 64–76 °C, N.C. contacts.

name: Magnetic Contact Detector IO 102‑11M (SMK‑3)
description: Point-type magnetic contact detector IO 102‑11M (SMK‑3), made in Russia. Installed in door and window frames, triggers when reed contact is opened. Compact and hermetically sealed plastic body.
short_description: IO 102‑11M (SMK‑3): point magnetic detector for windows and doors.

name: Detector IO 102‑14 (SMK‑14)
description: Plastic magnetic contact detector IO 102‑14 (SMK‑14) for surface mounting. Suitable for doors and windows, installed without recessing. Reliable reed switch, long-lasting.
short_description: IO 102‑14 (SMK‑14): surface-mounted magnetic contact detector.

name: Detector IO 102‑20 (A2P;B2P)
description: Magnetic contact detector IO 102‑20 (A2P or B2P versions) with protective sleeve for mounting on metal structures. Withstands mechanical stress and contamination. Suitable for industrial facilities and gates.
short_description: IO 102‑20 (A2P;B2P): SMK with sleeve for metal structures.

name: Flush-Mounted SMK Detector (Russia)
description: Flush-mounted magnetic contact detector (SMK) made in Russia, for concealed installation. Suitable for monitoring windows and doors, triggers when reed switch is opened.
short_description: Flush-mounted SMK: concealed magnetic contact sensor.

name: Manual Fire Detector (PKIL-IPR)
description: Manual fire detector PKIL‑IPR — reliable solution for transmitting a “Fire” signal when pressing the button. Designed for indoor use and connection to fire alarm systems. Easy installation and operation. Made of impact-resistant material.
short_description: Manual fire detector PKIL‑IPR — activates alarm on press.

name: Audio-Visual Alarm MARS‑12KP
description: The MARS‑12KP audio-visual alarm delivers a loud and bright alert signal. The impact-resistant IP55-rated housing protects against dust and moisture. Suitable for indoor and outdoor installation. Sound pressure — 105 dB, power — 12 V.
short_description: MARS‑12KP — audio-visual alarm, 105 dB, IP55 rated.

name: OKTAVA‑12 Audio-Visual Alarm
description: OKTAVA‑12 is an audio-visual alarm with a sound level of 105 dB and enhanced IP56 dust and moisture protection. Effective for fire or emergency alerts in indoor and industrial facilities. Compact and reliable.
short_description: OKTAVA‑12 — 105 dB alarm with IP56 protection.

name: SONATA‑M‑D Voice Announcer
description: The SONATA‑M‑D voice announcer is designed to play a customized message up to 16 seconds long. It has built-in memory, a 3 W output, and operates on 12 V. Compact design, suitable for wall or ceiling mounting.
short_description: SONATA‑M‑D — 3 W voice alarm with 16-sec message memory.

name: SONATA‑3 ver.2 (Ceiling)
description: The SONATA‑3 ver.2 ceiling acoustic module is designed for voice and sound alert systems. Output power — 3 W, impedance — 8 Ohms. White casing, compact and easy to install.
short_description: SONATA‑3 ver.2 — ceiling sound module 3 W, 8 Ohms.

name: SONATA‑3 (Wall-Mounted)
description: The SONATA‑3 wall-mounted acoustic module is used in voice alert systems. Power — 3 W, impedance — 8 Ohms. Compact plastic body in white. Easy installation and reliable performance.
short_description: SONATA‑3 — wall-mounted module 3 W, 8 Ohms for alerts.

name: OPOP‑RUBEZH Combined Alarm
description: The OPOP‑RUBEZH combined audio-visual fire and intrusion alarm provides loud 100 dB sound and bright light alerts. Durable casing, easy to install, suitable for both security and fire alarm systems.
short_description: OPOP‑RUBEZH — fire & intrusion alarm: light + sound.

name: SUZ-Mini-Strobe Alarm
description: SUZ-mini-strobe combines a siren, flashing light indicator, and strobe in one device. Suitable for emergency and security systems. Operates at 12 V, 15 W. Compact body and high reliability.
short_description: SUZ-mini-strobe — siren, flash, and strobe in one.

name: Siren 12V 10W
description: The 12 V 10 W acoustic siren is designed for security and fire alarm systems. Compact and loud. Compatible with most imported and domestic control panels.
short_description: 12 V 10 W siren — loud signal for alarm systems.

name: Junction Box KS‑4
description: KS‑4 junction box with 8 terminals is designed for reliable connection of TRBN and TPP wires. White body made of durable plastic. Widely used in fire and security system installations.
short_description: KS‑4 — 8-terminal box for TRBN and TPP wires.

name: Emergency Exit Sign VYKHOD‑EXIT 220V
description: The VYKHOD‑EXIT emergency exit sign operates on 220 V and includes a built-in battery that provides up to 1 hour of illumination during power outages. Texts in Uzbek, Russian, and English. Bright backlight and clear design.
short_description: VYKHOD‑EXIT sign — 1 hour backup, 3 languages.

name: Molniya 12V Light Sign
description: The 12 V Molniya light sign is designed for alert systems. Supports inscriptions such as 'EXIT', 'GAS LEAVE', 'AUTOMATION OFF', and arrow indicators. Bright backlighting and reliable operation at low voltage.
short_description: 12 V sign with EXIT, GAS LEAVE, AUTOMATION OFF texts.

characteristics.Inscriptions: EXIT, GAS LEAVE, AUTOMATION OFF, arrows

name: Lightning 220V
description: The 'Lightning' emergency exit light operates on 220V and features 'EXIT' indicators with directional arrows. Suitable for installation in various types of buildings. Provides 24/7 illumination and easy installation.
short_description: 220V emergency light with EXIT indicators and arrows.

name: Fire Cabinet SHPK-305

short_description: SHPK-305 (PSH-1) — fire cabinet 500×500×200 mm, 0.6 mm metal.

name: Dielectric Scissors

name: Fire Blanket PP300

name: Fire Blanket PP600
description: The PP600 high-density fire blanket is designed to extinguish and isolate large fire sources. Used in warehouses, industrial, and public facilities.
short_description: High-density fire blanket PP600 for large fire incidents.

name: Fire Bucket

short_description: 6L metal bucket for sand, water, and extinguishing agents.

name: Fire Axe TPP
description: The TPP fire belt axe is used in firefighting and structural dismantling. Made of impact-resistant steel, features an insulated handle and compact size. Can be attached to a belt with a sheath.
short_description: TPP fire belt axe — durable and compact tool.

name: Dielectric Gloves
description: Seamless dielectric latex gloves provide full protection when working with electrical equipment up to 1000 V. Used in firefighting, energy, and maintenance services.

name: Dielectric Boots

short_description: Dielectric boots for safe electrical installation work.

name: Dielectric Mat (Small)
description: Rubber dielectric mat 500×500×6 mm is used for personal protection against electric shock. Recommended for use in switchboards, workshops, and areas with electrical contact risk.

name: Dielectric Mat (Large)
description: Large rubber dielectric mat 750×750×6 mm for improved electrical safety. Used in switchboards, substations, and workshops.
short_description: Large 750×750×6 mm dielectric mat for switchboard use.

name: Rescue Rope VPS-30
description: The VPS-30 rescue rope is intended for evacuation and lifting of people during emergencies. Made from durable synthetic fibers, it resists abrasion and moisture. Length — 30 m.

name: Amplifier PA-5250USB, 250W

short_description: Ceiling speaker 10W, 100V, Ø232 mm, for paging and sound systems.

name: Ceiling Speaker MODEL-515B
description: Ceiling speaker MODEL-515B with rated power of 3–6W and operating voltage of 100V. Designed for indoor audio systems, installed in a ceiling hole with 160 mm diameter. Compact body and clear sound transmission.

name: Discharge Valve ZPU-OP
description: The ZPU-OP discharge-starting device is used in powder fire extinguishers models OP-1, OP-2, OP-3, OP-4, OP-5, OP-8, and OP-10. Ensures reliable release of extinguishing agent upon activation. Made of durable metal resistant to corrosion. Used during refilling and maintenance.
short_description: ZPU for powder extinguishers OP-1…10, wear-resistant, reliable.

name: Discharge Valve ZPU-OU (2–10)
description: The ZPU-OU discharge-starting valve is designed for CO₂ fire extinguishers OU-2, OU-3, OU-5, OU-8, and OU-10. Provides quick and reliable activation in case of fire. Used during maintenance and refilling. Made of material resistant to high pressure.
short_description: ZPU for CO₂ extinguishers OU-2…10. Metal housing.

name: Discharge Valve ZPU-OU (25–50)
description: The ZPU-OU (25–50) is a discharge-starting valve for large CO₂ fire extinguishers OU-25 and OU-50. Constructed from durable metal and withstands high pressure. Ensures reliable sealing and effective activation during maintenance.
short_description: ZPU valve for OU-25 and OU-50. High strength and reliability.

name: Pressure Gauge for OP-1…100
description: The pressure gauge is designed to monitor pressure in powder fire extinguishers with volumes ranging from OP-1 to OP-100. The measuring range covers working pressure values inside the extinguisher. Ensures safety and reliability in operation.
short_description: Pressure gauge for OP-1…100, accurate and reliable pressure reading.

name: Siphon Tube OP-3/4/5/6
description: The siphon tube is intended for powder fire extinguishers OP-3, OP-4, OP-5, and OP-6. Delivers extinguishing powder from the cylinder to the nozzle. Made of chemically resistant plastic. Replaced during extinguisher refilling.
short_description: Siphon tube for OP-3…6 extinguishers. Durable and resistant.

name: Fire Extinguisher Seal
description: The seal is designed to monitor the integrity of a fire extinguisher after refilling. It is installed on the shut-off and start-up device (SSD). Provides visual control: the seal is broken when triggered or opened.
short_description: One-time SSD seal for tamper indication.

name: Gland for Powder Extinguisher Valve
description: The gland is designed to ensure the tightness of valves in powder extinguishers such as OP-3, OP-4, OP-5, OP-8, and OP-10. Made of heat-resistant rubber and resistant to aggressive environments. Used during maintenance and repair.
short_description: Sealing gland for OP-3…10 valves. Durable and resistant.

name: SSD Safety Pin
description: Metal pin used to secure the shut-off and start-up device of fire extinguishers after refilling. Prevents accidental activation. Equipped with a ring for easy installation and removal.
short_description: Metal pin for SSD locking. Installed after refilling.

name: Hose for OP-50

short_description: High-pressure reinforced hose for OP-50. Durable and strong.

name: Hose for OU-10

short_description: High-pressure hose for OU-10. Strong and frost-resistant.

name: Hose for OU-25 and OU-50

name: Hose for OU-5

name: Nozzle for OU-2,3,5,10

name: Discharge Tube for OU-1,2,3

name: Nozzle for OP-3,4
